EXERT.DESCRIPTION: Pay extra [E] for a more powerful effect; often #ydegrades or #yrepairs the card

DEGRADE.DESCRIPTION: This card will #ytransform into a degraded version of itself, but can be repaired. An upgraded card will instead lose its upgrade.

REPAIR.DESCRIPTION: #yTransforms a degraded card into its unupgraded version.

CONSUME.DESCRIPTION: Consumed cards are permanently removed from your deck.

CRAFT.DESCRIPTION: Crafting a card adds it to your collection.
